Delete Rule: Are you sure you want to do this?
Hapus aturan: Apakah anda yakin ingin melakukan ini?

Delete Rule: Conditions (don't add conditions if rule is applied to all products)
Hapus aturan: Conditions (don't add conditions if rule is applied to all products)

Delete Rule: We found updated rules that are not applied. Please click "Apply Rules" to update your catalog.
Hapus aturan: Kami menemukan aturan baru yang tidak di terapkan. Harap klik "Terapkan Aturan" guna memperbaharui katalog anda.

Delete Rule: We can't delete this rule right now. Please review the log and try again.
Hapus aturan: We can't delete this rule right now. Please review the log and try again.

Delete Rule: We can't find a rule to delete.
Hapus aturan: Tidak kami temukan aturan untuk menghapus.

Delete Rule: Something went wrong while saving the rule data. Please review the error log.
Hapus aturan: Terjadi suatu kesalahan saat menyimpan aturan data. Harap Tampilkan kembali log yang salah.

Delete Rule: Rule with specified ID "%1" not found.
Hapus aturan: Tidak ditemukan rule dangan ID khusus "%1".

Delete Rule: Could not rebuild index for empty products array
Hapus aturan: Tidak dapat membangun kembali indeks untuk rangkaian produk kosong

Delete Rule: We can't rebuild the index for an undefined product.
Hapus aturan: Kami tidak dapat membangun kembali untuk produk yang tidak didefinisikan.

Delete Rule: Catalog rule indexing failed. See details in exception log.
Hapus aturan: Pengindeksan aturan katalog gagal. Lihat detail dalam log pengecualian.

Delete Rule: Percentage discount should be between 0 and 100.
Hapus aturan: Persentase diskon harus berada diantara 0 dan 100.

Delete Rule: Discount value should be 0 or greater.
Hapus aturan: Nilai diskon harus berada di 0 atau lebih besar.

Delete Rule: Adjust final price to this percentage
Hapus aturan: Sesuaikan harga akhir dengan persentase ini

Delete Rule: Adjust final price to discount value
Hapus aturan: Sesuaikan harga akhir dengan nilai diskon

Delete Rule: You disabled %1 Catalog Price Rules based on "%2" attribute.
Hapus aturan: Anda menonaktifkan %1 Peraturan Harga Katalog berdasarkan "%2" atribut.

Delete Rule: Undefined SQL operator "%1" passed in. Valid operators are: %2
Hapus aturan: Undefined SQL operator "%1" passed in. Valid operators are: %2

Delete Rule: Undefined rule operator "%1" passed in. Valid operators are: %2
Hapus aturan: Undefined rule operator "%1" passed in. Valid operators are: %2

Delete Rule: Undefined rule aggregator "%1" passed in. Valid operators are: %2
Hapus aturan: Undefined rule aggregator "%1" passed in. Valid operators are: %2

Delete Rule: The "%1" rule was unable to be saved. Please try again.
Hapus aturan: The "%1" rule was unable to be saved. Please try again.

Delete Rule: The rule with the "%1" ID wasn't found. Verify the ID and try again.
Hapus aturan: The rule with the "%1" ID wasn't found. Verify the ID and try again.
